string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
Someone I know needs help. He is a scumbag but he deserves assistance. Report to him and see what he wants.
Good luck stalker.
Raid Enemy Camp for Duty
Lead a Duty raid against an enemy camp.
We're preparing a raid on an enemy camp. I need you to lead the assault.
Excellent work. You are a fine warrior.
Locate Brain Scorcher Equipment
A stalker removed the Firebug part and hid it somewhere in the Zone. Find the part and get Petrenko back in 24 hours.

I won't tell the whole story, but I have information that the stalker managed to steal some of the Brainburner equipment and hide it in the Zone. We have to capture this part, it can be a powerful weapon and should not fall into the wrong hands. There are several places where it could be located. I want to check one of the possible locations. If you find anything there, get it here now. And don't drag it out until it's hidden, you've got 24 hours.
Okay, now it's our technicians. And for doing a good job of thanking you:
Petrenko's Most Wanted
Eliminate a member of another group. The deadline is 2 days.

There is someone who has caused me more trouble than anyone else in the Zone. So far, none of my men have been able to get to him. If you can kill him, I'll reward you well. Your time frame is two days.
Come on, get rid of that motherfucker! Well done. Here's your reward:
Search Lab X-19
General Petrenko will pay handsomely for any documents found inside Lab X-19 in Radar.

My sources tell me you plan on infiltrating the Brain Scorcher in Radar. I think you are out of your mind but if you are really going to go through with it I have an offer for you. Bring back any documentation you find in there. I will reward you well.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
A friend of mine could use your help. Go see him.
Good luck stalker.
Find Replacement %s for Gromov
Gromov screwed up the repairs. We need to find %s for him. The deadline is 6 days.

I need help, bro. A guy brought me his rifle for repair, but I ruined it. I need to find a replacement for him before he comes to pick up the gun. Find it fast and any way you can, you got six days for everything.
Find and bring %s for me. I don't have much money, but I have something I can give for it.
Ah, great! My thanks to you, you saved my ass. Here you go:
Clear Out Mutants for Gromov
Gromov needs a mutant-free road out of Bar. The deadline is 2 days.

Hey, bro, can you do something for me? I gotta go somewhere, but I hear there's a lot of mutants on the road from Bar. I'm not very good at shooting. Could you put them away for me? I'm in no hurry to go anywhere, but I think two days is enough for you.
Thank you, brother. Here's your well-deserved reward:
Duty Initiation Fee
General Petrenko will let you join Duty for a fee of 12,000 UAH.
We would be more than happy to have you join Duty. There is an initiation fee, of course. If you can bring me 12,000 UAH I'll get you in.
Welcome to Duty, stalker. Do us proud.
Capture the territory
It is necessary to eliminate the territorial threat in this zone. The deadline is 4 hours.

It has come to my attention that one of our camps is under threat. We must strike first. I need skilled fighters to do the job, will you? We need to do it very quickly before the threat is real, so you've got four hours.
Is it done? Well done, here you go:
Reclaim Duty Territory
It is necessary to return the territory occupied by the enemies to Duty control. The deadline is 24 hours.
There's an important matter. "Freedom has occupied one of our camps, and I need a good fighter to fix it. It's not an emergency, so you have 24 hours at your disposal.
Okay, well... Now, over here, over here and we'll put them in a ring... Oh, yeah, here's your reward:
Assassinate VIP for Petrenko
General Petrenko ordered us to find and eliminate the target.

I have a list of very important people to talk about, you know... It'll take care of you. I know there are mercenaries for this kind of thing, but we don't get along yet. Some of the targets are snitches, or a simple hooligans who find out what's wrong. But there are unit leaders, as well as Liberty dignitaries. Get all the information you can out of them, then finish it. The mission's on fire, I think two days is enough for you.
Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised.
Find %s for Gromov
%s are required by Gromov to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I can really use a good set of tools, stalker...and maybe some money. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I am looking for.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Cool dude...uh, sorry I can't pay you. I'll give you a good discount though, man!
Find %s for Gromov
%s are required by Gromov to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Hey, dude, if you happen to find some more advanced tools I will give you a discount. Will you keep a lookout for me?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great...GREAT! Now maybe I can make some damn money. I'm gonna be BIG time, stalker...if I can just get my act together. I don't have much to offer you other then a discount. Sorry, bud.
Find %s for Gromov
%s are required by Gromov to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Hey, dude, if you happen to find some more advanced tools I will give you a discount. Will you keep a lookout for me?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great...GREAT! Now maybe I can make some damn money. I'm gonna be BIG time, stalker...if I can just get my act together. I don't have much to offer you other then a discount. Sorry, bud.
